name: Snow Driver Skill 3D
description:
Snow Driver Skill 3D is adrenaline filled 3D simulator game.Drive as fast as you can. Pass hurdles, climb the hills, drift the rugged terrain of mountains, show offroad stunts in a real offroad simulation environment.
Features
- Hill climb levels through high mountains and different obstacles
-Amazing 3D graphics design bringing reality in game
- Attractive graphics with accurate physics.
- Different rocky environments to feel real offroad driving experience
